name: Resident Evil: Dead Aim
description:
The insidious activities of the Umbrella Corporation continue.

Take on the role of anti-Umbrella team agent, Bruce MacGavin in this all-new Resident Evil first-person action-shooter. Lost in the Atlantic, trapped on a sea-jacked cruise ship, it’s up to you to regain control of the ship. Seamlessly transitioning between first-person combat and navigation, sneak your way through the ship as you battle hordes of zombies and mutant beasts. Enhance your experience with the Guncon™2 light gun controller for greater accuracy and control. (Also supports DualShock 2 Controller.)

Your aim better be dead on or you’ll find yourself gone!
